f_template.body:
<launch> <arg name="umrf_file" default="$(find $(arg ta_package_name))/test/invoker_umrf.json"/> <arg name="wake_word" default="$(arg ta_package_name)"/> <arg name="action_path" default="$(find $(arg ta_package_name))"/>
<node name="temoto_action_engine" pkg="temoto_action_engine" type="action_engine_node" output="screen" args="--sa $(arg action_path) --d $(arg umrf_file) --mw $(arg wake_word)"/> </launch>
